pages.text:
About Us
At Pizza Bar South Beach, we believe great pizza shouldn't come with complications - just fresh ingredients, generous portions, and unforgettable flavor.Located on Collins Avenue in the heart of Miami Beach, we serve a wide selection of handcrafted pizzas, specialty pies, wings, salads, and late-night favorites.
Gallery
REviews
REviews
REviews
"Great pizza place that offers huge slices of pizza in many different styles. One slice is more than enough for 1 person here!  The garlic knots were also really good. Prices were less than I was expecting!."
-Tamara G.
"Massive slices of good pizza! I think its better here then pizza i had in New York. Children wings good here as well. Only had to takeaway as short walk from my hotel Royal Palm Beach."
-Kevin S.
